leaderboard.scoringExplanation: The score is based on how many attempts you used and how close you got. Fewer attempts and higher proximity = better score. Players who solve the challenge get priority!

howToPlay.title: How to Play
howToPlay.rule1: You have 12 attempts to guess the word of the day
howToPlay.rule2: Each guess will show you how similar your word is to the target word
howToPlay.rule3: The closer your guess, the 'hotter' the feedback will be
howToPlay.rule4: Use word proximity to narrow down your guesses
howToPlay.rule5: A new word is available every day at midnight
howToPlay.tipText: The proximity score is based on word meanings, not spelling. Words with similar meanings will score higher even if they're spelled differently!
